Annotations.ExternalBrowser.Title: Browser Engine
Annotations.ExternalBrowser.Value.Expand: This app uses a browser engine not provided by Apple. Some browser features from Apple that block unwanted cross-site tracking and minimize the amount of data passed to third parties may not be available. The developer is responsible for the privacy and security of your browsing information.
Annotations.ExternalPurchases.Expanded: All purchases in this app will be managed by the developer. Your stored App Store payment method and related features, such as subscription management, Ask to Buy, Family Sharing, and refund requests, will not be available. Apple is not responsible for the privacy or security of transactions made with this developer.
Annotations.ExternalPurchases.Expanded.V: All purchases in this app will be managed by the developer. Your App Store account, stored payment method, and related features, such as subscription management and refund requests, will not be available. Apple is not responsible for the privacy or security of transactions made with this developer and can’t verify any pricing or promotions that are offered.

Transactions in this app are supported by the developer and not Apple. Your accounts and purchases, and the privacy and security of them, will be managed by the developer. Your App Store account, stored payment method, and other related features will not be available from Apple. For refund requests, contact the developer.
